Lauritto | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 72,528 | population_as_of = 2010 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = uruguayense | population_note = | timezone1 = ART | utc_offset1 = -3 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = CPA base | postal_code = E3260 | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = +54 3442 | website = | footnotes = }} Concepción del Uruguay is a city in Argentina. It is located in the Entre Ríos province. It is about 320 kilometers north from Buenos Aires. 80,000 people lived here in 2001. ==Other websites== *Information and history *Concepción National University (Spanish) *On its foundation (Spanish) *Tourism in Concepción (Spanish) Category:Cities in Argentina Category:Entre Ríos Province
